title: Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse; PS/2 and USB; 300 DPI; colors: red, gray, white
descriptions:
Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse

A comfortable mouse that’s easy on your hand and simple to use.

What it is:
- A “trackball” mouse. Your hand stays still on the desk. You move the red ball with your thumb or fingers to move the pointer on the screen. This can be easier on wrists and shoulders.

Why you’ll like it:
- Gentle on hands: No need to slide the whole mouse around.
- Easy to control: Smooth, steady movement with a 300 DPI sensor—great for everyday browsing, email, and photos.
- Simple buttons: Just two main buttons, like a classic mouse. No confusing extras.
- Scroll made easy: Side-to-side scrolling helps you read wide pages without fuss.
- Works for everyone: Comfortable for both right-handed and left-handed users.
- Stays put: About 7 inches long, 4 inches wide, and 2.5 inches high—stable and easy to rest your hand on.

Easy to set up:
- Plug it in with USB (most modern computers) or PS/2 (older computers). No batteries to worry about.

Looks good:
- Classic Logitech design with a red trackball and gray/white body.

Made to last:
- Reliable Logitech quality, manufactured in China.

Who it’s for:
- Anyone who wants less strain on hands and arms.
- People who find a regular mouse hard to control or tiring.
- Great for home use, email, browsing, and puzzle or card games.

Getting started:
- Plug the cable into your computer’s USB port.
- Place your hand on the mouse.
- Roll the red ball gently to move the pointer.
- Click the left button to select, the right button for options.

If you want a mouse that is comfortable, steady, and easy to use without learning anything new, the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 is a friendly choice.
